import React from 'react' import {useDispatch, useSelector} from 'react-redux' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' const Header = () => { const userLogin = useSelector(state => state.userLogin) const {userInfo} = userLogin return (
E-Commerce
  • Cart
  • {userInfo ? (
  • {userInfo.name}
    • Action
    • ) : Sign In}
) } export default Header
